resources.array:
//Dares - Teens (testArray3)
Eat a mouthful of crackers and try to whistle
Pretend to be a waiter or waitress and take snack orders from everyone in the group
Prank call someone you know
Call someone you think is attractive and pay that person a compliment about their best feature
Update your status on social media using only words that start with the letter "T."
Do a belly dance for the group
Exchange shirts with the person next to you for the next round of questions
Wear a funny hat on your head for the next three rounds of questions
Wear your pants backward for the rest of the game
Switch clothing with someone of the opposite gender
Find something to wear as a cape and act like a superhero
Set up a tea party between any of the stuffed animals in the house. Invite the girls in your group to join.
Make up a rap about the person to your right
Lick someone’s foot 2 times
Soak your T-shirt in water and put them in the fridge for 20 min, and then wear it
Peel a banana with your feet
Stand on your head for 10 straight seconds
Call up your crush and declare your love for him
Lick a bar of soap
Blow in someone’s ear
Show everything that’s in your wallet
Kiss a stuffed animal like it is your crush
Draw a bunny on your face with only lipstick
Go outside and dance like a cowboy
Act like a girl how do they makeup
Act like a dog and fetch a few objects
Choose anyone here and dance with them
Shout your first crush name loudly
Tell a bad joke in a really enthusiastic way
Say two really bad things about every player
Write a letter to someone you hate and send it
Let everyone in the group style your hair and take photos
Suck all your fingers
Act like a gorilla
Tell someone honestly what you think of them
Keep a finger in your mouth for the next dare
Act like a mad person who has escaped from a mental institution
Let the person next to you text anyone from your phone
Listen to a song at high volume
Curse like sailor for 20 seconds straight
Eat a raw onion
Fill your mouth with water and say all your best friends names
Send a text message to your mom that you’re expecting a baby soon
Imagine there is baby in front of you, act how you will keep that baby to sleep
Open Facebook and accept all your pending friend requests
Go outside and propose to the first person you see outside by bending one knee
Close your nose with your fingers and start talking for 2 minutes
Lift any two of your friends and spin around for 15 seconds each
Allow any one friend make fun of you until you laugh
Brush and floss your teeth in front of everyone
Put on a pair of high heels and walk a few times across the room
Eat your worse vegetable raw
Go into a dark closet for a minute
Sniff the breath of everyone in the room and say who has the worst
Put your hair in a silly style such as a pony tail on the top of your head
Try to scratch your armpit with your big toe
Bite into a lemon slice
Pretend you are in bed having a nightmare
Act out a scene from your favorite movie
Spend the next round sitting on someone’s lap
Go outside and sing a clip of your favorite Disney song at the top of your lungs
Do the hokey pokey in the middle of a circle of players and sing a suitable song
Put an ice cube down your pants, and keep it there until it melts
Ask for permission every time you need to use the washroom
Imitate another player and let everyone try to guess who you are
Smell another player’s armpits
Go to the kitchen and eat a chili
Kiss the pillow until it is your turn again
Gaze into the eyes of the person on your left for 30 seconds
Fast dance to a slow song
Try to lick your elbow while singing a song
Moonwalk while a friend takes a video
Run around the house banging your chest and yodeling at the same time
